product_name: Hammer Nutrition HEED Sport Drink Mix - 32 Serving
long_description: No matter what your sport of choice may be, this 16-serving tub of HEED(TM) (High Energy Electrolyte Drink) will have you going the extra mile with ease! Provides the right blend of electrolytes, calories and fluids to maintain a consistent energy level for up to two hours during your workout. HEED contains no citric acid-won't burn your throat or upset stomach. Ingredient l-carnosine helps prevent lactic acid buildup in muscles. Sweeteners stevia and xylitol are added to replace simple sugars that most other sport drinks use; promotes oral health. Easy to use-simply mix with 16 - 24 ounces of water and consume. Specifications based on a range of flavors; nutrition facts displayed here and on wrapper may differ; information on wrapper reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: No matter what your sport of choice may be, this 16-serving tub of HEED(TM) (High Energy Electrolyte Drink) will have you going the extra mile with ease!
